attributes.action: Do a u-turn on the abolishment of the 10p tax rate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's an outright insult that the poorest in our society should be treated in this manner. The 10p tax rate was in place to support the poorest people in our society. Gordon Brown has illistrated with this, that Labour has lost touch with its core voters. It's about time the Prime Minister did a u-turn on the abolishment of the 10p tax rate!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
